title: [Temperature Check] - Current Team Members Reconfirmation
body:
### Summary
This signaling snapshot poll aims to re-confirm the current Leagues’ team members with renewed positions and responsibilities in light of the [last mandate’s learnings and insights](https://gov.idle.finance/t/idle-leagues-mandate-2-report-may-august-2021/586). 

### Motivation/rationale
With the [new Leagues-Labs structure introduced in this post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/idle-leagues-v2-0-current-team-reconfirmation/585), we aim to improve cross-Leagues communication and speed up initiatives that require multiple skill sets in order to be completed.

The last mandate has been insightful and helped us identify our angles and area of specialization. With this in mind, we are proposing a revised structure for the positions and responsibilities of each current Leagues member.

### Current Members and New Positions
**Treasury League**
* @Salome
* **Current position**: Mid-level PM (full-time)
* **Next mandate position**: Mid-level Contributor (part-time) for business development and ecosystem development
* @EmixPrime
* **Current position**: Mid-level PM (full-time)
* **Next mandate position**: Mid-level Contributor (full-time) for ecosystem development and DAO architecture and facilitation
* @RT P
* **Current position**: Supervisor 
* **Next mandate position**: Senior Contributor level 1 (part-time) for ecosystem development & DAO architecture and facilitation
* @ETM612
* **Current position**: Supervisor
* **Next mandate position**: Advisor for ecosystem development and token economy
* @Teo
* **Current position**: Supervisor
* **Next mandate position**: Senior Contributor level 2 (full-time) for business development and DAO architecture and facilitation
* @Davide
* **Current position**: Supervisor
* **Next mandate position**: Senior Contributor level 1 (full-time) for business development and token economy

**Development League**
* @8bitporkchop
* **Current position**: Mid-level Dev (part-time)
* **Next mandate position**: Mid-level Dev (part-time) for smart contract development
* @William
* **Current position**: Supervisor
* **Next mandate position**: Senior Dev level 2 (full-time) for smart contract development
* @gravityblast
* **Current position**: Supervisor
* **Next mandate position**: Advisor for smart contract development
* @samster91
* **Current position**: Supervisor (or Idle Labs product manager)
* **Next mandate position**: Advisor for product management

**C&M League**
*  @DenisDevcic
* **Current position**: Pilot program PM
* **Next mandate position**: Mid-level Contributor (full-time) for product marketing management 
*  @mikojava
* **Current position**: Pilot program PM
* **Next mandate position**: Advisor
* @Teo
* **Current position**: Supervisor
* **Next mandate position**: Advisor

### Side note for Idle Labs members
As Idle Labs (the genesis team and company), we would like to begin a process of integration of part of the core team (founders + Idle Labs contractors) into the DAO – the goal here is to ultimately dissolve the company and have all the active contributors for the Idle Protocol working for the DAO.

As part of the founding team, we will always commit ourselves to the long-term success of the protocol and DAO, with respect to our internal token and governance [policy](https://gov.idle.finance/t/idle-labs-team-policy-and-governance-participation/207). 

Furthermore, we (Idle Labs members: @Teo, @william, @samster91, @Davide, @gravityblast) would like to forego the next mandate’s compensation for our positions in order to boost the growth of the Leagues-Labs structure and allow more active community contributors to join the Leagues, scaling initiatives, and growth for the protocol.

### Voting Options

Please cast your vote on one of the following options:

* **IN FAVOR**: Re-confirm the current Leagues’ team members with renewed positions 
* **AGAINST**: Not proceed with re-confirmation

This poll is available for both [$IDLE token holders](https://snapshot.org/#/idlefinance.eth) and [stkIDLE holders](https://snapshot.org/#/staking.idlefinance.eth).
The final $IDLE voting weights will be calculated using the [approved framework](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BnH9boRmBADuyquvDMh0AmQfF97Zj76sIENKtySLU8o/edit?usp=sharing).
